title: The Nature of salt
brief_description: A short documentary showing how salt affects different environments, for example, how it kills grass. Also shows some laboratory-like experiments such as “water taking salt from soil”. Towards the end of the film we also see aspects of ‘salt mining’ via live footage and diagrams.
